attributes.title: Out of Mind Complete
attributes.caption: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, "Out of Mind" picks up in the middle of Season 4, and continues on into the events of Season 5.
attributes.description: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, "Out of Mind" picks up in the middle of Season 4, and continues on into the events of Season 5, chronicling the adventures of the character Tex and her pursuit after the bounty hunter Wyoming.

attributes.title: Relocated Complete
attributes.caption: Taking place directly after Season 6, The Reds make themselves at home at their new base while Caboose works on a secret project.
attributes.description: Taking place directly after Season 6, The Reds make themselves at home at their new base while Caboose works on a secret project.

attributes.title: Recovery One
attributes.caption: Recovery One chronicles the adventures of the character Agent Washington.
attributes.description: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, Recovery One occurs after the events of the Out of Mind Mini-Series and during Season 5 of the Blood Gulch Chronicles. Recovery One chronicles the adventures of the character Agent Washington.

attributes.title: MIA
attributes.caption: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, the MIA Mini-Series occurs somewhere in between the beginning and end of Season 9.
attributes.description: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, the MIA Mini-Series occurs somewhere in between the beginning and end of Season 9. It follows the misadventures of the Red and Blue team as they search for Grif while inside the Epsilon Unit.

attributes.title: WTAWTAW
attributes.caption: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, Where There's a Will, There's a Wall Mini-Series follows the misadventures of the Red team as they try to discover what is behind a huge wall and the Blue team fights over who will fly the helicopter.
attributes.description: Spun off from the main Red vs. Blue series, Where There's a Will, There's a Wall Mini-Series follows the misadventures of the Red team as they try to discover what is behind a huge wall and the Blue team fights over who will fly the helicopter.

attributes.title: ODST
attributes.caption: The RvB guys get an early look at a new type of mission featuring “regular” soldiers like them… or so they think.
attributes.description: The RvB guys get an early look at a new type of mission featuring “regular” soldiers like them… or so they think.

attributes.title: Grifball - Expansion
attributes.caption: Introducing Team Slipspace, the worst team in the Grifball League!
attributes.description: Introducing Team Slipspace, the worst team in the Grifball League!

attributes.title: Grifball - Zero Tolerance
attributes.caption: With the League's strict Zero Tolerance policy, does Slipspace stand a chance at this season?
attributes.description: Scandal rocks the IGLE when a member of Team Slipspace is accused of using a controlled substance. With the League's strict Zero Tolerance policy, does Slipspace stand a chance at this season?

attributes.title: Grifball - Franchise Player
attributes.caption: The Commissioner forces Team Slipspace to accept a new (and expensive) player onto their team.
attributes.description: The Commissioner forces Team Slipspace to accept a new (and expensive) player onto their team.

attributes.title: Grifball - Double Agent
attributes.caption: Rookie decides it's time to get an agent.
attributes.description: Rookie decides it's time to get an agent.

attributes.title: Holiday Plans!
attributes.caption: Sarge is forced to go on vacation because of his piling up vacation days. To make it up to Grif and Simmons, in the spirit of the holidays, Command has them relocated to a more festive location!
attributes.description: Sarge is forced to go on vacation because of his piling up vacation days. To make it up to Grif and Simmons, in the spirit of the holidays, Command has them relocated to a more festive location!
